name: Astra Ignota Demo
detailed_description:
Color the whole board using symmetrical galaxies.
An innovative puzzle based on an idea from the authors of the Sudoku.

This demo contains:
  • 30 pleasant, hand-crafted levels, or infinite randomly-generated puzzles.
  • Difficulty ramps up from tutorials to devilish.
  • A touch of background story, uncovered chapter by chapter.
  • A soothing soundtrack.

The full game contains:
  • More levels.
  • More story episodes.
  • More than 2h of gameplay.
  • More features, including the range filler and a level editor.
  • Steam achievements and stats

short_description: A relaxing, space-themed puzzle game where you fill a board using symmetrical figures. An idea originally from the authors of the Sudoku, much harder than it looks! All boards are hand-crafted for maximum enjoyment.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian, Catalan
